name: Wild Wild West Bandits (itch)
description:
Wild Wild West Bandits

Shoot the way free. Play as Cowboy or Cowgirl. In this retro top-down shooter with dual stick control.

Endless fun! Classic arcade action! 8-Bit pixel graphics and chiptune music! No IAP! Without Ads! With Gamepad & Touch support! A tribute to games like Western Fighter for C64 from 1988.

Controls:

Left Stick & ASDW | Move

Right Stick & Arrow Keys | Aim & Fire

Enter | Start/Pause

T | Toggle Touch

F11 | Fullscreen
